## 描述 / Description

## 类型 / Type
- [ ] Bug 修复 / Bug Fix  
- [ ] 新功能 / New Feature  
- [ ] 文档更新 / Documentation Update  
- [ ] 其他 / Other:  

## 清单 / Checklist
- [ ] 我已阅读并遵循贡献指南 / I have read and followed the contribution guidelines
- [ ] 我已在本地测试这些更改 / I have tested these changes locally
- [ ] 我已更新相关文档或注释 / I have updated relevant documentation or comments
- [ ] 我确认此更改不会破坏任何原有功能 / I confirm this change does not break any existing features
- [ ] 我已在多个微信版本上测试此更改 / I have tested this change on multiple WeChat versions

### 合规性与原创性声明 / Compliance & Originality
- [ ] **本人确认所提交的所有代码及 Hook 点位均为独立分析研发** / I confirm that all code and Hook points submitted are independently analyzed and developed by me.
- [ ] **本人承诺不包含任何从未经授权的第三方项目中“直接抄袭”或“反编译搬运”的内容** / I guarantee that this PR does not contain any content "directly copied" or "transplanted via de利pilation" from unauthorized third-party projects.
- [ ] **如果参考了其他开源项目，我已在“其他信息”中明确标注来源及协议** / If I referenced other open-source projects, I have clearly cited the source and license in the "Additional Information" section.

## 其他信息 / Additional Information
